snippet: Gov. Pat Quinn’s administration must eventually pay the 2011 wage increases that were promised to state workers, Judge Richard J. Billik Jr. of Cook County Circuit Court ruled Friday.
abstract: Judge Richard J Billik Jr of Cook County Circuit Court, Ill, rules that Gov Pat Quinn’s administration must eventually pay 2011 wage increases that had been promised to state workers, regardless of whether state budget has enough money.
lead_paragraph: Gov. Pat Quinn’s administration must eventually pay the 2011 wage increases that were promised to state workers, Judge Richard J. Billik Jr. of Cook County Circuit Court ruled Friday.

headline.seo: Illinois: Judge Rules for Workers in Pay Dispute With State
headline.main: Illinois: Judge Rules for Workers in Pay Dispute With State
headline.print_headline: Illinois: Judge Rules For Workers In Pay Dispute With State

keywords.value: American Federation of State, County and Municipal Employees
